medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was awoken from sleep yesterday at 0400 with sharp, pleuritic, epigastric/RUQ pain, along with non-bilious, non-bloody vomiting. The pain is reported to be different from prior gallstone pain. Diarrhea also noted today.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholelithiasis, sarcoidosis, nephrolithiasis, diabetes mellitus type 2, gastroesophageal reflux disease, hypertension, previous appendectomy, and cholecystectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Positive for nephrolithiasis, no gastrointestinal disease.
